languages.text: {n}Могучего телосложения мужчина осматривает поле брани. Его лицо, волевое и бесстрастное, напоминает о статуях героев Империума. Задержавшись на вас взглядом, он поднимает вверх железный кулак:{/n} "Арбитры — периметр. Формация — сорок семь пятьдесят пять. Глейто — рядом".

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."
languages.original_text: {n}Могучего телосложения мужчина осматривает поле брани. Его лицо, волевое и бесстрастное, напоминает о статуях героев Империума. Задержавшись на вас взглядом, он поднимает вверх железный кулак:{/n} "Арбитры — периметр. Формация — сорок семь пятьдесят пять. Глейто — рядом".

His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters removes his mirrored helmet. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters removes his mirrored helmet. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

{n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

languages.text: {n}Ein kräftig gebauter Kämpfer lässt seinen Blick über das Schlachtfeld schweifen. Sein entschlossenes und teilnahmsloses Gesicht erinnert dich an die Statuen des Imperiums. Sein Blick ruht weiter auf dir, als er seine eiserne Faust hebt.{/n} "Arbitratoren, Perimeter sichern, Formation 47-55. Glaito, bei Fuß."
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein kräftig gebauter Kämpfer lässt seinen Blick über das Schlachtfeld schweifen. Sein entschlossenes und teilnahmsloses Gesicht erinnert dich an die Statuen des Imperiums. Sein Blick ruht weiter auf dir, als er seine eiserne Faust hebt.{/n} "Arbitratoren, Perimeter sichern, Formation 47-55. Glaito, bei Fuß."

languages.text: {n}L'un des combattants à la carrure imposante évalue rapidement le champ de bataille. Son visage, à la fois déterminé et impavide, n'est pas sans rappeler celui des statues des héros de l'Imperium, et son regard reste braqué sur vous tandis qu'il lève un poing ganté de fer.{/n} « Arbitrators, sécurisez le périmètre, formation 47-55. Glaito, au pied. »
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'un des combattants à la carrure imposante évalue rapidement le champ de bataille. Son visage, à la fois déterminé et impavide, n'est pas sans rappeler celui des statues des héros de l'Imperium, et son regard reste braqué sur vous tandis qu'il lève un poing ganté de fer.{/n} « Arbitrators, sécurisez le périmètre, formation 47-55. Glaito, au pied. »

languages.text: {n}Uno de los guerreros, un hombre de complexión fornida, recorre el campo de la batalla con la mirada. La expresión de su rostro, decidida e impasible, te recuerda a las estatuas de los héroes del Imperium. Levanta un puño de acero sin apartar su mirada de ti:{/n} «Arbitrator, aseguren el perímetro, formación 47-55. Glaito, ven aquí».
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

traits.locale_text: {n}Uno de los guerreros, un hombre de complexión fornida, recorre el campo de la batalla con la mirada. La expresión de su rostro, decidida e impasible, te recuerda a las estatuas de los héroes del Imperium. Levanta un puño de acero sin apartar su mirada de ti:{/n} «Arbitrator, aseguren el perímetro, formación 47-55. Glaito, ven aquí».

languages.text: {n}一位体格壮硕的男性战斗人员快速扫了一眼战场，坚毅的脸上毫无表情，不仅让人想起帝国的英雄雕像。他举起一只铁手，目光紧盯着你。{/n}“帝国法务官，正在确认周边区域安全，阵型47-55。格雷托，跟上。”
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

traits.locale_text: {n}一位体格壮硕的男性战斗人员快速扫了一眼战场，坚毅的脸上毫无表情，不仅让人想起帝国的英雄雕像。他举起一只铁手，目光紧盯着你。{/n}“帝国法务官，正在确认周边区域安全，阵型47-55。格雷托，跟上。”

languages.text: {n}戦闘員たちの中にいる、屈強な体格の男が戦場の状況を確認する。その表情は決然として無感情で、帝国の英雄像に刻まれた顔を思わせる。彼は視線をあなたに向けたまま、鉄の拳をゆっくりと掲げた。{/n}「アービトレイター、周囲を確保しろ。フォーメーション47-55で配置につけ！グライト、横につけ」
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."

traits.locale_text: {n}戦闘員たちの中にいる、屈強な体格の男がミラーバイザーのついたヘルメットを外した。その表情は決然として無感情で、帝国の英雄像に刻まれた顔を思わせる。彼は視線をあなたに向けたまま、鉄の拳をゆっくりと掲げた。{/n}「アービトレイター、周囲を確保しろ。フォーメーション47-55で配置につけ！グライト、横につけ」

languages.text: {n}Savaşçılar arasındaki aşırı yapılı bir adam, çatışma alanını gözlemliyor. Kararlı ve vurdumduymaz suratı, İmparatorluk kahramanlarının heykellerini hatırlatıyor. Demir yumruğunu kaldırırken gözlerini senden ayırmıyor.{/n} "Yargıcılar, çevreyi temizleyin. 47-55 sayılı dizilim. Glaito, rahat."
languages.original_text: {n}A powerfully built man among the fighters quickly surveys the battlefield. His face, determined and impassive, recalls those seen on statues of heroes of the Imperium. His gaze remains trained on you as he raises an iron fist:{/n} "Arbitrators, secure perimeter, formation 47-55. Glaito, heel."
